Name: Monsterlands
About the game: Gameplay Monsterlands is a rogue-like survival game with minimal controls. The only control you have is the movement of the player, weapons will attack automatically and the monsters will try to hunt you. The goal is to survive all enemy waves and collect gold to unlock new upgrades and player characters. Can you survive? Game Features Weapons With 10 different weapons in the game there is a lot of variety and many combinations to try out and find the best one. List of all available weapons: Sword Boomerang Knife Rock Circle Ice Wand Pistol Heat Aura Shuriken Arrow Bomb Items Items will give your hero and your weapons various improvements and make you stronger. With every level up you have a chance to choose between three items or weapons. Player Characters There are 10 different player characters. Each of them has their own specific starting weapon and a special perk.
Meta Title: Monsterlands: Jun 14, 2022, Lukas Domeisen and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Monsterlands? Check out the release date (Jun 14, 2022), developer insights from Lukas Domeisen, and a complete game summary.
